gui.graphical

Class Graphical

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.graphical.Graphical
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GUI

    public class Graphical
extends java.lang.Object
implements GUI
    GUI - Graphical Mode
    Makes an implementation of the interface GUI for exhibiting the game, using Java's default graphic libraries (AWT and Swing).
    Author:
    Karina Suemi, Renato Cordeiro Ferreira, Vinicius Silva
